topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Operations Console Overview

section.p: The Operations Console (Ops Console) is designed for Helion OpenStack Administrators to have a web-based UI that they can use to operate and manage the Helion OpenStack environment.
The following topics explain how to use each of the menus in the console:

ul.li:
General
Dashboard
Logging
Alarm Explorer
Alarm Creation
Notification Methods

Compute
Compute - Alarm Summary
Compute Hosts
Compute Instances
